annotation.spannedText: Vaccines are one of the great public health achievements

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines are one of the great public health achievements

annotation.spannedText: Thanks to vaccines, serious and often fatal diseases like polio, that were once common, are now only distant memories for most Americans

classMention.mentionClass: Thanks to vaccines, serious and often fatal diseases like polio, that were once common, are now only distant memories for most Americans

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines are the safest way to protect you, your children and your community from a long list of serious and potentially life-threatening illnesses

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines are the safest way to protect you, your children and your community from a long list of serious and potentially life-threatening illnesses

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines protect you by preparing your immune system to recognize and fight serious, and sometimes deadly, diseases

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines protect you by preparing your immune system to recognize and fight serious, and sometimes deadly, diseases

annotation.spannedText: From infants to senior citizens, getting vaccines on time is one of the most important ways to protect yourself and others from serious diseases and infections

classMention.mentionClass: From infants to senior citizens, getting vaccines on time is one of the most important ways to protect yourself and others from serious diseases and infections

annotation.spannedText: It's also important for adults to be sure that they have received all the vaccines recommended for adults

classMention.mentionClass: It's also important for adults to be sure that they have received all the vaccines recommended for adults

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines teach your body's immune system to recognize infections so it can fight them off in the future

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines teach your body's immune system to recognize infections so it can fight them off in the future

annotation.spannedText: When you get vaccinated, you not only protect yourself but you also help protect the people around you who might be too young or too sick to get vaccinated themselves

classMention.mentionClass: When you get vaccinated, you not only protect yourself but you also help protect the people around you who might be too young or too sick to get vaccinated themselves

annotation.spannedText: If enough people stopped getting vaccinated, outbreaks of now-rare vaccine-preventable diseases, such as measles, could return

classMention.mentionClass: If enough people stopped getting vaccinated, outbreaks of now-rare vaccine-preventable diseases, such as measles, could return
